title: We cannot be certain whether Chaucer or a scribe placed the lines from the Thebaid as an epigraph for the Knight's Tale. The Latin quotation appears in several manuscripts, including Hengwrt and Ellesmere, and it seems to me probable that Chaucer was responsible for making the explicit connection between his classicizing romance and its canonical Latin forebear.
